regen.new_specification: The system shall validate the integrity and format of all updates received from other functions or authorized staff before processing them.
The system shall support batch submissions of updates for multiple records, allowing authorized staff to efficiently manage large-scale updates.

regen.absent_element: validation of updates for consistency and accuracy
regen.new_specification: The system shall validate all received updates for consistency and accuracy before applying them to the database.

label: Allows updates to be submitted in batches.
